title: What's up with Zac's jump indicator?
body:
In the last patch, when you started channeling Zac's jump, it would show the max range of the jump, as well as the max range of where you would jump while you are channeling. Right now, it only shows his current range as he is channeling and not his max range. This makes it difficult to judge how long you should channel, since you don't know what his total max range is.

Is this intended or a bug?

replies.body: A bug. I broked it, sorry. My fix didn't get in time to make it in this patch. :-/
